sentence.Network_en: "OK, whatever you say," he had agreed peaceably.
sentence.Network_cn: “好吧，你说什么都行，”他和气地同意了。

sentence.Network_en: The rival guerrilla groups had agreed to stop fighting and settle their differences peaceably.
sentence.Network_cn: 反对派游击组织同意停战，以和平的方式解决争端。

sentence.Network_en: We've got families to support. " The man seemed most peaceably inclined.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们得养家糊口埃 " 这个人看来很倾向于采取和平的方式.

PerfectNetExp.abs: peaceable 温顺的,温和的,和平的peaceably 和平地;温和地peaceful 和平的,爱好和平的;安静的,平静的.

for most of Year One of this insanely elongated process the Democratic Party had been a peaceable kingdom .在这个被疯狂拉长的选举过程的大部分时间里，民主党就似一个平静的王国。

entry.tran: 和平地；平静地；非暴力地
entry.def: If you do something peaceably, you do it quietly or peacefully, without violence or anger.

example.ex: The rival guerrilla groups had agreed to stop fighting and settle their differences peaceably...
example.tran: 反对派游击组织同意停战，以和平的方式解决争端。

example.ex: 'OK, whatever you say,' he had agreed peaceably.
example.tran: “好吧，你说什么都行，”他和气地同意了。

sentences.sentence: "the tenant paying the rent hereby reserved and performing the several covenants herein on his part contained shall peaceably hold and enjoy the demised premises"
